TestOfCircuitAlu2.inputCircuit: module alu(in op(1), out x0(2), inout x1(2), inout x2(2)) if op then x0 ^= (x1 + x2) else x0 ^= (x1 - x2) fi op

TestOfCircuitSwap2.inputCircuit: module alu(inout x1(2), inout x2(2)) x1 <=> x2

TestOfCircuitSimpleAdd2.inputCircuit: module alu(out x0(2), inout x1(2), inout x2(2)) x0 += (x1 - x2)

TestOfCircuitMultiply2.inputCircuit: module alu(out x0(2), inout x1(2), inout x2(2)) x0 ^= (x1 * x2)

TestOfCircuitModulo2.inputCircuit: module alu(out x0(2), inout x1(2), inout x2(2)) x0 ^= (x1 % x2)

TestOfCircuitNegate8.inputCircuit: module statements(inout x(8)) ~= x; ++= x; --= x module main(inout s(8)) call statements(s); uncall statements(s)

TestOfCircuitRor32.inputCircuit: module ror32(out o(3), in shift(2), in word(3)) for $i = 0 to 4 do if ($i = shift) then for $l = 0 to (#word - $i) do o.$l ^= word.($i + $l) rof; for $r = 0 to $i do o.((#word - $i) + $r) ^= word.$r rof else skip fi ($i = shift) rof
